k-turrets.add.entity.type: Add new entity type to target list
k-turrets.choose.tooltip: Choose which entities to remove by pressing the appropriate buttons
k-turrets.hold.alt.to.scroll: To scroll the target list, hold Alt and use the mouse wheel
